thread.section_title: The Trafalgar Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of The Trafalgar Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Wendy B
title: Great location
text: This was the perfect spot to see London from. Almost everything was within walking distance, and for places that we not the tube was very nearby. The room was spacious and comfortable. The staff was very nice and helpful. The continental breakfast consisted of a variety of fruits, meat, cheese and bread and was wonderful. If we ever find ourselves wanting to visit London again we will certainly stay here.
